search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EasyPractice (easypractice.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for EasyPractice can be found at: [https://easypractice.net/pricing/](https://easypractice.net/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Enterprise

per month

* * *

The enterprise solution is for companies looking for a custom-made booking platform. We'll tailor EasyPractice to your needs. Contact us and let us know about your specific needs.

[Contact us](mailto:support@easypractice.net)

Recommended for practitioners and therapists!

UNLIMITED ACCESS

from

per month (excl. VAT)

* * *

Up to 500 client appointments  
in your system[](https://easypractice.net/pricing/#)

Online Booking

Event administration

Easy client invoicing

Statistics page

Integration with Google Calendar

E-mail notifications

Secure journal system

Receive online payments

Free SMS reminders

[Get Access](https://easypractice.net/signup/?package=1)

100% GDPR compliant & secure. No credit card required.

Free access

per month (excl. VAT)

* * *

Everything in unlimited version, but with a 2 clients maximum:

Free SMS reminders

Try the platform for FREE

Create up to 2 clients

[Get Free Access](https://easypractice.net/signup/?package=0)

100% GDPR compliant & secure. No credit card required.

Including everything you need

Gain access to a great number of features that make a difference to your work
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Always here to help

A world class support team ready to assist you all the way
----------------------------------------------------------

We’re here to offer support and to guide you on your EasyPractice journey. If you have any questions about getting started, get in touch with our world class support team who will assist you with any queries you may have.

[Get in touch at support@easypractice.net](mailto:support@easypractice.net)

![Image 1: Pia and Paulina from the support team](https://easypractice.net/wp-content/themes/easypractice/img/support-img-2.png.webp)

Read about our pricing at EasyPractice Aps and choose the subscription plan that best suits your business, whether large or small. Read more.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a free tier with limited features and additional costs for specific apps.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Full access to features with higher limits.

features: Tailored solutions based on specific needs
